title: Bon Appetit magazine typeface
content:
Could anyone identify the typeface used in Bon Appetit magazine? In particular, the typeface used for the nameplate and the serif typeface used in their articles. Thanks!

[http://www.bonappetit.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150327213023/http:/www.bonappetit.com/ "http://www.bonappetit.com/")
author: csping

comments.content: Don't know the serif in the articles ( do you have a sample? ), but the serif used on the nameplate and website is [Mrs Eaves](http://web.archive.org/web/20150327213023/http:/www.emigre.com/EF.php?fid=109).
It's Glypha, if you're talking about [this text](http://web.archive.org/web/20150327213023/http:/www.bonappetit.com/pdfs/CLUBJAN09.pdf)

Actually, the nameplate is a custom design by Matthew Carter—Cherie Cone told me so.

Mike Diaz :-)
